text: Cluny is a city in eastern France. It lies in the region of Bourgogne-Franche- Comté. The city grew around the Abbey of Cluny in the 10th century. The town of Mâcon is about 30 km to the southeast. Lyon is about 60 km to the south. Today, about 4,400 people live in the city. The Cluniac Reforms started here. Category:Communes in Saône-et-Loire
title: Cluny
